      • Reservation

        public Reservation(java.lang.String reservationId,
                   java.lang.String reservationName,
                   java.lang.String number,
                   java.lang.String email,
                   java.time.LocalDate checkIn,
                   int duration,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Room> rooms,
                   double totalCost,
                   boolean advancedPurchase)
        Create a reservation object
        Parameters:
        reservationId - the id of the reservation
        reservationName - the name on the reservation
        number - the phone number associated with the reservation
        email - the email associated with the reservation
        checkIn - the check in date for the reservation
        duration - the duration of the stay
        rooms - the rooms included the reservation
        totalCost - the total cost of the reservation
        advancedPurchase - whether the booking was an advanced purchase reservation or not
